pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Estimation of Number of Principal Components in PCA // Automatic estimation of number of principal components in PCA with PEnalized SEmi-integrated Likelihood (PESEL). See Piotr Sobczyk, Malgorzata Bogdan, Julie Josse 'Bayesian dimensionality reduction with PCA using penalized semi- integrated likelihood' (2017) doi:10.1080/10618600.2017.1340302.
